bibl.title: Papirusnye svidetelstva ob organizacii proizvodstva i prodaze kharty v Egipte vremeni Ptolemeev. [Papyrus-Testimonies concerning the Organization of the Production and Sale of Charta in Egypt in the Times of the Ptolemies.].
Problemy socialno-ekonomiceskoj istorii Drevnego Mira. Sbornik pamjati akademika A.I. Tjumeneva

bibl.seg: Borukhovic V.G., Papirusnye svidetelstva ob organizacii proizvodstva i prodaze kharty v Egipte vremeni Ptolemeev. [Papyrus-Testimonies concerning the Organization of the Production and Sale of Charta in Egypt in the Times of the Ptolemies.].
Problemy socialno-ekonomiceskoj istorii Drevnego Mira. Sbornik pamjati akademika A.I. Tjumeneva (Moscou - Leningrad, 1963) pp. 271-287.
